p: Aqueous extracts were prepared from each collected sample by addition of 10 g of the powder to 100 mL of water. The mixture was heated at 80 °C for 10 min for enzyme deactivation. Mixtures were filtered using Whatman #1 (pore size = 125 mm; Whatman, Maidstone, UK). Filtrates were kept at 4 °C for subsequent use.
